name: Flying gorilla 3d
description:
ummmmm flying gorilla 

so this game is for ios and some pepole can't play it because they are mac or windows or even android so this game is for all genres anyways for the real

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

umm. so... yeah. this is my April fools thing.

Use the buttons on the screen, AD, or Left/Right arrow keys to move the gorilla.

The cloud had a few problems, I think I fixed it, but it also seems like the cloud variables aren't meant to be used this way. Let's just say it's a part of April fools.

This is another copy of an already existing game, I might make original games soon, so... stay tuned for that.

Original game:

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/flying-gorilla/id1365028549

and thanks to griffpatch for the 3d game tutorial

I heard tags give you free views so...
